casebody.data:
In the Matter of Emanuel BAER, Debtor. Emanuel BAER, Appellant, v. Bena Hexter ASKENASE and David B. Hexter, Appellees. No. 469. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 29, 1933. Abraham J. Halprin, of New York City (Irving Barry and Pineus Cashman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Miller, Bretzfelder & Boardman, of New York City (Bertram Boardman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
